channel.title: Big server help!
channel.description:
Ok i need to know and and were to: Please tell me where to place
[b]Make items like ::archer (gives pure arching stuff) Make npcs talk almost 24/7 (please tell specifically) Make admins have all stats 135 (::godstats) Allow admins to do ::pickup commands[/b]

item.title: Big server help!
item.dc:creator: @Pizz4_0wnz Pizz4 0wnz
item.description:
@Pizz4_0wnz wrote:

and for the godstats put

[code=actionscript]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“godstats”) && (playerRights >= 2))

{
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(486000000, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);
addSkillXP(486000000, 5);
addSkillXP(486000000, 6);
addSkillXP(486000000, 7);
addSkillXP(486000000, 8);
addSkillXP(486000000, 9);
addSkillXP(486000000, 10);
addSkillXP(486000000, 11);
addSkillXP(486000000, 12);
addSkillXP(486000000, 13);
addSkillXP(486000000, 14);
addSkillXP(486000000, 15);
addSkillXP(486000000, 16);
addSkillXP(486000000, 17);
addSkillXP(486000000, 18);
addSkillXP(486000000, 19);
addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
sendMessage(“WOW nice lvls go own the shit out of noobs!”);
}[/code] in your commands

Read full topic

item.title: Big server help!
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

ok go to NPChandler.java and search for “moo” Now after the last bracket “}” of the moo code add a code like this:

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "WHAT YOU WANT NPC TO SAY"; } }

Read full topic
